Table of Contents

Class TransmittedMTOfRhoAndSubregionHistDetector

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo.Detectors
Assembly
Vts.dll

Implements IDetector. Tally for momentum transfer as a function of Rho and tissue subregion. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

public class TransmittedMTOfRhoAndSubregionHistDetector : Detector, IDetector
